n: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake in a Glass
des: "Cake-flavored vodka just may be the best thing in a bottle; it tastes great mixed with just about anything. This yummy cocktail combines the flavored vodka with pineapple juice for a sweet treat. Fresh pineapple also makes a great garnish."
ins:
Fill a glass with ice.
Splash grenadine over ice.
Pour cake-flavored vodka and pineapple juice over the ice; stir.
Garnish with maraschino cherry to serve.
